title: Deployment, Daemons and Datacenters
description:
Deployment, Daemons, and Datacenters

Presented by Andrew Godwin

A tour through the systems that power `ep.io <http://ep.io/>`__, the
Python hosting platform, from the array of daemons powering the system,
to how redundancy is set up, and also covering general best practices
for hosting Django sites yourself.
